86 Thinking at Systems Scale 🤔

Jun 20, 2024

  • civictech
  • episode
  • systems thinking
  • government
  • scale

We’re joined by Greg Jordan-Detamore to talk about the digital services in operations, how applying civic tech practices happen where resources are constrained, and overcoming differing language choices.
